menu.description: At The Pizza Shop, we take pride in our homemade pasta dishes made with only the freshest ingredients. From classic spaghetti to more unique pasta creations, our menu has something for everyone to enjoy.

items.name: SPAGHETTI BOLOGNESE
items.description: Classic spaghetti with our homemade meat sauce.

items.name: THREE-CHEESE MEATBALL MOSTACCIOLI
items.description: Mostaccioli, ricotta, ground beef, our homemade pasta sauce with meat and homemade meatballs

items.name: FETTICINE ALFREDO
items.description: Fettuccine, butter, heavy cream, Parmesan, Romano and eggs.

items.name: SPICY CHICKEN AND TOMATO PASTA
items.description: Chicken broth, our homemade tomato sauce, chicken breasts and pasta.

menu.description: At The Pizzeria, we take pride in our authentic wood-fired pizzas made with only the freshest ingredients. From classic Margherita to more unique pizza creations, our menu has something for everyone to enjoy.

items.name: MARGHARITA
items.description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomato and basil.

items.name: BISMARK PIZZA
items.description: Italian-style pizza with homemade tomato sauce and cheese topped with cooked ham and egg.

items.name: QUATTRO FORMAGGI
items.description: Pizza with four different types of cheese.

items.name: CALZONE
items.description: Folded pizza stuffed with mozzarella, ham and mushrooms.

items.name: FUNGHI
items.description: Pizza with mushrooms, mozzarella and truffle oil.

menu.description: At The Pizzeria, we have a delicious selection of desserts to finish off your meal. From traditional Italian favorites to more unique creations, our menu has something for everyone to enjoy.

items.name: ITALIAN CANNOLI
items.description: Traditional Sicilian pastry dessert that consists of a fried and crispy pastry shell, stuffed with a creamy ricotta filling and chocolate chips.

items.name: TIRAMISU
items.description: Italian dessert made of ladyfinger pastries dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone and flavoured with cocoa.

items.name: CREAMY PIE
items.description: Creamy pie, made with whipped cream and cheese inside buttery graham cracker crust.
